title: Virtual Assistant YT tasks (3+)
job_overview:
We're hiring (3+) YouTube assistants to:

* Record AI voiceovers (using ElevenLabs/Minimax)
* Upload videos with proper titles, tags, and descriptions
* Follow SOPs and naming conventions
* Ensure content is published on time, error-free

 **Requirements:**

* Previous experience with voiceover tools or YouTube uploading
* Detail-oriented, serious, and reliable
* Able to follow systems and daily checklists
* Fluent English, both written and spoken
* Proactive communication

 **Compensation:**

* \$250/month full-time 

Hiring until July 17th.
